thread.title: Guess & Co. Corporation Launches Energy Group Unit

author: cnbc.com
title: Guess & Co. Corporation Launches Energy Group Unit

organizations.name: corporation launches energy group unit durham

text:
Durham, North Carolina, Feb. 05, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Guess & Co. Corporation a global diversified development and infrastructure company based in Durham, North Carolina has launched a new operating unit. Guess & Co. Corporation has entered the energy market with the launch of its Energy Group unit. The Energy Group unit replaces the Company's previous Luxury Group unit. Guess & Co. Corporation's Energy Group businesses will include electric power, nuclear power, oil & gas, renewables and drilling/exploration operations. "As we look to revitalize communities while serving government and private sector customers and clients, we decided that it was best to launch a dedicated group for energy in order to deliver the best solutions possible," the Company issued in a statement. The team for the new unit will collaborate with those for industrial, health care and real estate to develop and market multi-faceted integrated energy platforms. Guess & Co. Corporation's four business units are now: the Energy Group, the Industrial Group, the Health Care Group and the Real Estate Group. The Company has assigned engineers and advisors with federal energy regulation experience to assist with the development of the new Energy Group.
About Guess & Co. Corporation
Guess & Co. Corporation is a global diversified development and infrastructure company that revitalizes communities and supports governments and private sector entities through its four primary business units: the Energy Group, the Industrial Group, the Health Care group and the Real Estate group. We are based in Durham, North Carolina and conduct business in the United States and abroad. Most of our businesses are built organically, and we pursue acquisitions of existing companies that will create value for our customers, employees, shareholders and communities that we serve. For more information, visit www.guessandco.com .
